original_en: <MsgSectStyle>[I’ve acquired it. No need to review...]</>
context: <MsgSectStyle>「我已经会了，不用再看了……」</>

original_en: <MsgSectStyle>[I’ve mastered it. No need to review...]</>
context: <MsgSectStyle>「已烂熟于心，不用再看了……」</>

original_en: <MsgSectStyle>[Hey! I told you I don’t need to review !]</>
context: <MsgSectStyle>「都跟你说了，不用再看了，你还点？!」</>

original_en: <MsgSectStyle>[I’ve acquired it. No need to review...]</>
context: <MsgSectStyle>「已经学会了啦，不用看了……」</>

original_en: <MsgSectStyle>[I’ve learned this skill! ]</>
context: <MsgSectStyle>「我已会使这门绝学了！」</>

original_en: [Nothing found...]
context: 「没挖到什么东西……」

original_en: What’s this place? Anybody here? Hello? Hi? Oi —
context: 这是哪里！有人吗？喂~喂~~喂~~~

original_en: Let’s spar once we’ve restored our Vigor.
context: 我们把气血回满再来切磋。

original_en: The opponent is considering how to deal with you...thinking of the relations between you two and their attitude toward you...weighing the risks...
context: 对方正在考虑如何处置你...考虑与你的关系和态度...正在考虑风险...。

original_en: Forbidden area! No entry for strangers!
context: 门派禁地，生人不得擅闯！

original_en: What are you looking at? Get out!
context: 看什么看？滚！

original_en: You wanna join our sect? Impossible!
context: 就你这厮也想入我门，痴心妄想！

original_en: Meet the entry requirements and you can become one of us!
context: 想要入得鄙门，只需达成入门条件便可！

original_en: I’ve reported to the sect leader. The honorable one,you’ll receive the leader’s letter soon.
context: 在下已禀报掌门，阁下稍事片刻可收到掌门回信

original_en: Hum? Get up!
context: 嗯？！给我起来！

original_en: Who’s hiding there? Come out!
context: 躲躲藏藏，鬼鬼祟祟，给我出来！

original_en: Hum? Who’s there! !
context: 嗯？！谁在那？！

original_en: Nice gear!
context: 这装备真不错！

original_en: This Skill is perfect for me!
context: 这门绝学似乎很适合我！

original_en: Warrior,thank you for saving me!
context: 多谢大侠救命之恩！

original_en: Horses like eating grass. Monkeys like eating pinecones or plums. Martens and snakes like eating meat and eggs. Eagles like eating meat.
context: 马喜欢吃草，猴子喜欢吃松果或梅子，貂和蛇喜欢吃肉和蛋，鹰喜欢吃肉。

original_en: Soon there will be a Kungfu Contest in areas with such a campaign. I can't wait any longer. Is there anything that a martial arts champion can't do? Hahahaha!
context: 只要有武林大会的区域过段时间就会召开了，好期待~~如果能当上武林盟主，那真的是可以为所欲为了，哈哈哈哈。

original_en: There’s a Bulletin Board at the Mountain Gate of every sect. You can take a look,see if you meet their Entry Requirements. But I’m not sure whether you’re worthy or not.
context: 各个门派的山门都有公告板，你可以去看看符不符合入门条件。不过人家不一定看得上你~~

original_en: You can use your Chi to heal minor injury. If the injury is too severe,you can go to clinic for healing. But Clinics often charge a high fee. ..
context: 小伤的话自己真气贯通就可以治疗了，如果伤势过于严重只能去医馆治疗了，不过他们收费都挺贵的。。。

original_en: Trade,complete commissions,or work at all kinds of stores. But doing illegal business always earns more. Ahaha,just like taking supplements will make you stronger!
context: 交易，帮人完成委托任务，或者去各大店铺打杂。不过怎么都没有干出格的事情来的快哈哈，马无夜草不肥嘛~~~

original_en: Hehe,no one is invincible in this world. You can improve your power by collecting more skills,Inner Kungfu,Abilities,and Gears. But remember,only the fitting combination means the true power.
context: 呵呵呵~这个世界没有真正的无敌~你可以通过收集绝学、内功、能力、装备来提升实力，不过只有将它们组合搭配好，才能真正强大。

original_en: I heard that you can acquire advanced Qinggong at the Eagle Hunt Platform and Mirror Lake Stonewoods.
context: 我听说在逐鹰台和镜湖石林可以领悟高级轻功。

original_en: Give everything you owe me now!
context: 把欠我的都交出来！

original_en: You’re not too stupid,huh? Now get out! Don’t mess with me! !
context: 算你识相，滚吧！以后小心点，别惹我！！

original_en: That was your lesson today!
context: 今天先给你个教训！

original_en: Sorry,I didn’t mean to do this! Let’s forget this,shall we?
context: 我惹不起你！这件事就算了吧！

original_en: I'm tired today. Come and see me tomorrow.
context: 我今天已经很疲惫了，明天再来请教吧

original_en: I'm tired today. I need to digest what we just covered. Let's continue tomorrow.
context: 我今天累了，先把刚学会的融会贯通，明天再传授我吧

original_en: (...Hold still...Just bear with it for a little longer, we're almost there! ! ! )
context: (……不要乱动……再坚持一会儿，天门就要开了！！！)

original_en: Not bad,I bet you can unify the martial arts world.
context: 不错不错，一统江湖就靠你了。

original_en: Haha,I just invented it. Didn’t expect there would be a side effect. I’ll find you when I fix this.
context: 哈哈，我也是刚研究出来的，没想到有点副作用，等我改良了再找你哈~~

original_en: Humph! Don’t say I didn’t warn you!
context: 哼~不识好歹。

original_en: Good day,sir! May you live a long and healthy life!
context: 大官人~万寿无疆~~

original_en: I’m too kind to see children poorer than me...
context: 我真是太善良了~~看不得比我可怜的孩子~~

original_en: You made me cry! Time to say goodbye!
context: 你真的~~我哭了~~山高水长，江湖再见~~

original_en: Thanks Bodhisattva!!
context: 菩萨显灵了！！！

original_en: The cold wind is howling. The white snow is falling...
context: 寒风萧萧~~飞雪飘扬~~

original_en: How did I meet a blind person...
context: 遇到了瞎子...可惜了~~

original_en: Two healthy legs are way more important! Does my wisdom dwarf yours? Ahahaha!
context: 当然是要有双好腿啊！！我的睿智真是让你望尘莫及，哈哈哈哈哈

original_en: Even the most powerful one can be hurt by gossips and backstabbing,right? ?
context: 武功再高也怕菜刀，你躲得过流言蜚语、暗箭伤人吗？？

original_en: A man of morality values righteousness,while the despicable eye silver and gold. The people who are merely profit-driven will eventually turn against you.
context: 君子喻于义，小人喻于利。你用财帛驱使的人，最终难免反噬。

original_en: We’re two of the same kind! !
context: 果然是我辈中人！！

original_en: This is what we call love,ahaha!
context: 这才叫相濡以沫~哈哈哈

original_en: I made 38 couples get married! I did a quite good job,didn’t I?
context: 不错不错，今年撮合了 38 对姻缘。

original_en: Thank you for saving me! Here is a pill handed down from our ancestors. Please take it,warrior.
context: 救命之恩，涌泉相报！这是我祖传丹药，请大侠务必收下。

original_en: My leg is broken! Give me 1000 coins! Or I’ll find the seniors and accuse you of bullying me! !!
context: 我的腿断了！！给我 1000 钱！！否则到宗门告你恃强凌弱！！！

original_en: Ah,the business isn’t going well these days...
context: 哎~~买卖越来越不好干了~~

original_en: You’re seriously ill. I suggest you go to the Clinic at [Flora Valley] later on. Here is a [Marrow Refining Pill]. It can help you heal some of the ailments!
context: 阁下身患重疾，最好找「百花谷」的医馆治疗一番，我这有一颗「洗髓丹」给你，姑且可以帮你先治疗一些隐疾！

original_en: Oh,I thought you’re a freshman.
context: 哦，我还以为你是新来的。

original_en: Haha,you’re not stupid,huh? Bye.
context: 哈哈，算你识相~~后会有期。

original_en: I must teach you a lesson! !
context: 看来得给你小子一点教训！！

original_en: Good! From this day on,we resolve to band together to face whatever lies ahead!
context: 好！今后你我有福同享，有难同当！

original_en: Humph! Don’t say I didn’t warn you!
context: 哼！不识抬举。

original_en: Nice!
context: 真好~

original_en: Humph!
context: 哼！

original_en: Put this on. You need to keep warm. You can’t catch a cold in this state.
context: 行了，快穿上吧，别落下隐疾了。

original_en: You ask for this. Goodbye and never see you again.
context: 真是死要面子活受罪，再见吧。

original_en: Build the residence to shelter yourself from the cold and restore Vigor in it!
context: 建好民居，你就有了一处容身之所了，可以抵御寒冷和恢复气血！

original_en: Having a hot spring bath,taking a sip of tea at the teahouse,or listening to melodies at the Music House will cheer you up!
context: 温泉泡个澡、茶馆喝口茶、乐楼听个小曲，都可以让你心情好起来！

original_en: Really? Many thanks! Ahaha,I promise I’ll share it with you when I master it. !!
context: 真的？！那在下先谢过了，哈哈哈，待我练成以后，必定与你分享！！！

original_en: It’s said the skill in this manual is the most powerful one in this world. Don’t you want to have a look at it? !
context: 这本秘籍传闻天下无敌，你真的不想一探究竟么？！

original_en: That stone lies on the Dragonhead in Longting. Find a way to get there on your own!
context: 该奇石位于龙亭龙头之上，至于怎么过去，你自己想办法吧！

original_en: Believe it or not,it’s up to you!
context: 不信拉倒！

original_en: Here,here,let me mark a location for you. Go look over there.
context: 来来来，我给你标记个位置，你过去找找。

original_en: Is there anyone who isn’t interested in treasure chest? !
context: 居然有人对宝箱不感兴趣？！

original_en: Interact with others and click [Skills] to view.
context: 与他人交互，点击「学艺」即可查看。

original_en: Bye!
context: 告辞！

original_en: I marked a location for you. Go have a look.
context: 给你标记了个地点，你过去看看吧。

original_en: I bumped into a pervert?
context: 我这是碰到个变态？

original_en: Your teachings on {0} are truly remarkable. I'm truly grateful.
context: 阁下传授这{0}真了不得，在下受益匪浅，感激不尽!

original_en: Thank you for teaching me {0}. I'll make sure to repay your favor.
context: 竟传我{0}，日后我必报答阁下恩德!

original_en: Thank you for showing me the ropes with {0}. Without you I'd still be lost.
context: 全仗阁下指点{0}，若不是阁下，我还在那里胡涂呢。

original_en: {0}! I'll make every effort to practice this martial art. Thanks a million! ! !
context: 居然是{0}！在下定好生练习这门武艺，感激不尽！！！

original_en: Wow, it's {0}! That's a real treat. My thanks may never do it justice.
context: 竟然是{0}！让在下大开眼界，真不知如何表达谢意才好!

original_en: Spend more time practicing the {0}. It might help you out of danger one day! ! !
context: 好生练习这门{0}，危急时，定能助你化险为夷！！！

original_en: The Skill is well and good, but true mastery comes only with diligent practice.
context: 绝学虽好，但需勤修，方见成效，切勿虚妄!

original_en: Your kungfu skills outshine many, but your willpower must not wane. Train with diligence, lest arrogance prevails.
context: 武艺虽胜，意志不能弱，务必勤加修炼，切莫骄纵!

original_en: The sole key to mastery lies in diligence. Practice hard, and you'll rise to greatness.
context: 绝技修得，唯一秘诀在勤奋，切记要勤学苦练，方有所成!

original_en: A prized technique cannot be mastered without diligence. Hone your gift with practice, and you'll be rewarded.
context: 绝技虽妙，非勤苦修习不能成，切记勤修方显成效!

original_en: Please wait, {0}! There's a favor I'd like to ask of you! ! !
context: {0}，请留步！我有一事相求！！！

original_en: Wait, {0}! There's something you need to know!
context: {0}，等一下！我有事相告！

original_en: Hold on, {0}. There's something I wish to discuss.
context: {0}，留步，有要事相商！

original_en: Wait, {0}! Hear me out!
context: {0}，莫走，听我说明来意！

original_en: Please wait, {0}. I have urgent news to share.
context: {0}，劳请留步，有要紧事相告！

original_en: By heaven and earth, I love only you!
context: 天地为证，今生今世，我只爱你一个！

original_en: I need nothing else but you. Let us grow old together, till death do us part.
context: 情深不寿，有你便成。与你生死相许，白头到老!

original_en: My love runs deep as the sea. I entrust myself to you, till our hairs turn grey.
context: 情深似海，与你生死相托，白首不渝!！

original_en: May the heaven and earth bear witness, I love you through life and death.
context: 天地可鉴，你我秉烛俱老，生死之交！

original_en: From this day forward, I pledge to stay by your side till the end of our lives.
context: 从今往后，我愿与你白头偕老，不离不弃！

original_en: C’mon,{0}! Follow me!
context: {0}，来来来！快跟上我！

original_en: Where are [#1you] taking me?
context: [#1你]要带我去哪里？

original_en: Where are [#1you] going?
context: [#1你]究竟要去何处啊?

original_en: Where exactly do [#1you] want to go? What's the matter?
context: [#1你]到底要去哪？有何要紧之事？

original_en: Where are [#1you] headed?
context: [#1你]要走多远啊？

original_en: Help! My house is burning to the ground!
context: 救火啊，家都要烧没了!!!

original_en: Fire! Help!!!
context: 着火啦！快救火啊!!!

original_en: Who set the fire?! Murderer!!
context: 放火的在哪?!要我们的命啊?!!!

original_en: Oh wow, what a bonfire. It'd be a disservice if we don't have some barbeque!
context: 这么热闹，不吃烧烤都对不起这场火灾了!!!

original_en: Seize the arsonist! Burn them to ashes, let them feel our wrath!
context: 抓住放火的，一定要把他烧成灰，让他知道马王爷有几只眼!!!

original_en: Cheers! !!
Drink up!
context: 干了这杯！

original_en: Ah,that’s a good wine! !!
context: 好酒！！！

original_en: Nothing lifts the spirits like a good ol' drink!
context: 一壶灌饮，烦恼皆消!

original_en: Life is short, let's make merry! Raise a glass, say bye to your worries!
context: 人生苦短，及时行乐!一壶清酒，一身轻松!

original_en: Life is harsh. Only this flask offers some solace.
context: 世态炎凉，唯有这一壶独饮，真真解却万般世俗烦恼!

original_en: Life is fleeting, have fun when you can! Here's to my health!
context: 世事无常，及时行乐，这杯酒我自斟自饮!

original_en: Life is fleeting, time to have fun!
context: 人生几何，及时行乐，莫失己乐!

original_en: Life doesn't always go as planned. Better find joy when you can than dwell on woes!
context: 人生不如意事常有，及时行乐，当下体验，更好过度日烦恼忧愁!

original_en: Life is but a dream, toil and labor won't endure. Seize the moment, with a glass of wine. Release the burdens of earthly confine.
context: 人生如梦，劳碌辛苦终难长久。及时行乐，一杯清酒，释放尘寰烦恼

original_en: Life is a dream, joy makes it sweet. A glass of fine wine, makes the moment shine.
context: 浮生若梦，为乐更浓。壶中美酒，当下最重。

original_en: Life and death are predestined, so are riches and fame. Embrace the joy of the moment, lest youth goes to waste.
context: 生死定数，富贵非我。及时享乐，不负韶华。

original_en: Alas, the many autumns that have gone by. How the world ages!
context: 山水有情天地老，人生几度秋风凉。

original_en: What peace and happiness. What more can the seasons bring?
context: 蠶已吐丝，蜜已成蜜。只此安乐，怎一个春秋!

original_en: Flowers come and go, the moon waxes and wanes. This life won't repeat, so let's drink to the heart's content.
context: 花开花落，月上月下，此生难再，及时行乐，把酒痛饮。

original_en: The river flows, carrying memories of heroes. Life is a leaf adrift, caught in the draught of death. Here's to health, to joy in the moment.
context: 滚滚长江东逝水，浪花淘尽英雄。生如叶上寄，死如风中流。及时行乐，把樽中美酒饮。

original_en: Damned beggar, get out!
context: 臭要饭的，赶紧滚！

original_en: Get lost! You worthless piece of trash!
context: 走远点！除了讨饭没本事的废物!

original_en: Get out! Lazybones!
context: 滚！等着人施舍的懒骨头!

original_en: Get lost! Don't get in the way!
context: 去去去！别碍眼！

original_en: What a nuisance! Get lost! !
context: 真是烦人！滚远点！！

original_en: Shoo! Move your ass somewhere else!
context: 去去去，到别地儿要饭去！

original_en: What a bother! Move out of the way!
context: 烦不烦，别在这里碍眼!

original_en: Have you no shame? Get lost!
context: 要不要脸，快给我消失!

original_en: I don't have a shred of pity for you.
context: 对你我可生不出怜悯之心。

original_en: You're annoying as a fly. Stay away from me!
context: 你怎么跟苍蝇似的，离我远点！

original_en: I'm sorry, I don't have anything to give you.
context: 抱歉，我也没东西给你呢

original_en: I'm sorry, but I don't have any money right now.
context: 在下此刻没有钱财，实在抱歉!

original_en: I would have spared you some change, but I'm afraid I'm also penniless.
context: 我也身无分文，否则定将施舍一点济助!

original_en: I wish I could help. Perhaps you should ask someone else.
context: 我实在爱莫能助，你找找其他人吧。

original_en: I don't have any money left. You can ask someone else.
context: 你再去问问其他人，我身上没钱了。

original_en: Good day, master! ! !
context: 参见掌门！！！

original_en: Greetings, Master!
context: 掌门大人万福！

original_en: Greetings, shifu!
context: 参拜师尊！

original_en: Greetings, Master!
context: 弟子参拜老祖宗！

original_en: Greetings master! !
context: 掌门万安！！

original_en: Greetings, Champion! ! !
context: 参见武林盟主！！！

original_en: Long live the Champion!
context: 盟主万岁!

original_en: All hail the Champion!
context: 盟主雄姿英发!

original_en: The Champion is the best!
context: 天下英雄，盟主第一!

original_en: All hail the Champion!
context: 盟主威武!

original_en: Greetings, Master!
context: 拜见武林泰斗!

original_en: Greetings, Master!
context: 武林后辈参见前辈!

original_en: Greetings, Champion!
context: 盟主万福金安！

original_en: Greetings, Master! What an honor!
context: 在下有幸拜见前辈！

original_en: Long live the Champion! ! !
context: 盟主万岁万岁万万岁！！

original_en: The Champion is the best!
context: 武林泰斗，盟主乃天下第一!

original_en: The one and only Champion!
context: 武林神龙会首，盟主当世独步天下!

original_en: Greetings, Champion!
context: 拜见天下无双，武林盟主!

original_en: Greetings, Champion!
context: 拜见当世神龙，武林盟主!

original_en: You've breached Sect Rules, and I'm here to arrest you. Surrender now! ! !
context: 你已触犯门规，在下奉命执行，速速就擒！！！

original_en: Those who violate Sect Rules shall be punished!
context: 触犯门规者，必受惩处!

original_en: Those who disregard Sect Rules shall be disciplined!
context: 违背师法者，定受门规制裁!

original_en: You've breached Sect Rules. There's no pardon!
context: 你已违背门规，罪无可赦!

original_en: Surrender! You've breached Sect Rules. There's no escaping punishment!
context: 还不快束手就擒，你触犯门规在劫难逃！

original_en: What goes around comes around. Someone has hired me to teach you a lesson!
context: 事有因，果有果，有人找我来教训你一顿！

original_en: I'm told to teach you a lesson, wretch!
context: 我接了人家的任务来管教你这个混账东西!

original_en: I'm entrusted to teach you a lesson!
context: 我受人所托，来给你一点颜色看看!

original_en: I'm told to teach you a lesson, scoundrel!
context: 我奉人之命来教训你这个不懂规矩的败类!

original_en: I'm told to teach you a lesson. Don't stir up trouble again!
context: 我受人之托给你一点教训，以后别再惹是生非了！

original_en: Thief! You dare sneak up on me? I'm gonna let you pay!
context: 小贼！敢偷袭我？！今日之事，必让你付出代价！

original_en: You scumbag, I'm gonna take you down!
context: 你这个卑鄙小人，我跟你拼了!

original_en: You rotten scum, I'm gonna tear you apart!
context: 你这个死无赖，我定要你的狗命!

original_en: Sneaking on me? You coward! I'm gonna rip you to bits!
context: 你这个懦夫，竟然搞偷袭，我非杀了你不可!

original_en: Sneaking on me? Your days are numbered!
context: 胆敢偷袭我，你活腻了!

original_en: Don't you dare run, thief! You're just asking for a beating!
context: 窃贼休走，鬼鬼祟祟，找打！

original_en: Filthy thief, sneaking before me? You're gonna pay!
context: 死贼，竟敢在我面前偷偷摸摸，我定要你倾家荡产!

original_en: To hell, wretched thief!
context: 你这种贼人，简直活该万劫不复!

original_en: Stealing before me? You're asking for trouble!
context: 敢在我面前偷东西，你简直找死!

original_en: I've had my eyes on you for a while, thief. Prepare to meet your end!
context: 我早就盯上你这个贼了，今天一定要了你的狗命!

original_en: You monster! How dare you slaughter the innocent!
context: 你这个畜生，竟然这样残杀无辜，真是畜生不如!

original_en: You killed the innocent! You monster!
context: 你这样下作地屠杀好人，简直禽兽不如!

original_en: You'll pay dearly for those innocent lives, you fiend!
context: 你这个魔头，我定要你为这些无辜的生命偿还!

original_en: Are you even human? You fiend!
context: 这样滥杀好人，你还有人性吗!你简直成魔了!

original_en: What a heinous act of slaughter! You fiend!
context: 你这个恶魔，这样滥杀无辜的行径，真是令人发指!

original_en: I'm ending your atrocities, once and for all!
context: 你行恶多端，今日我便斩了你！

original_en: I can't bear to witness your vile deeds!
context: 你这样的行径，实在是让人看不下去!

original_en: How dare you commit such heinous deeds, you scoundrel? You deserve a most terrible death!
context: 你这个混账东西，竟敢做出这么过分的事，真是罪该万死!

original_en: What an appalling crime! You scum!
context: 你这个败类，这样的行径简直令人发指!

original_en: Your sins are unforgivable, you monster!
context: 你真是个祸害，做这种伤天害理的事，简直罪无可赦!

original_en: You annoying scum! I've had enough. You're gonna get pummeled!
context: 你这鼠辈，惹我不快，早就看你不顺眼了！看我不揍趴你！

original_en: You again, scum!
context: 又是你这个败类!

original_en: Oh, it's that detestable face again!
context: 又见到你这张可恶的脸!

original_en: You nuisance! Just looking at you makes me puke!
context: 你这个讨人厌的家伙，简直让人看着就烦!

original_en: You're disgusting!
context: 你这样的人，简直令人作呕!

original_en: Don't make a scene! Hand over your belongings, and your life shall be spared! !
context: 匪我思存，非礼勿言！留下财物，不伤你性命！！

original_en: Think you can lay a hand on me, wretch? You're asking for trouble!
context: 你这个混账东西，竟敢动我的手，找死!

original_en: You dare provoke me, thug! You don't know what you're up against!
context: 你这个狂徒，竟敢挑衅我，简直是自不量力!

original_en: You want to provoke me, you fool? You're digging your own grave!
context: 你这个蠢货，敢主动招惹我，真是活得不耐烦了

original_en: You dare provoke me? You're too full of yourself!
context: 你也敢挑衅我，你也太高估自己了!

original_en: You dare provoke me, loser? You must have a death wish!
context: 你个三脚猫，也敢招惹我，你是活腻了吧!

original_en: This hatred is an incurable poison burning in my soul. Today, you shall feel my wrath!
context: 此恨不共戴天，你与我水火不容，今日我便要来送你上西天！

original_en: I'm determined to settle this blood debt today, once and for all!
context: 我们之间的这笔血债，我今天定要讨回来!

original_en: Time to settle the score between us!
context: 我们之间的恩怨，今天也该了了!

original_en: I'm having your life, hateful wretch! !
context: 你我仇深似海，今天要你的狗命！！

original_en: It's a fight to the death between you and me! ! !
context: 我与你不死不休！！！

original_en: Hum? ...I can't find {0} nearby...
context: 嗯？……好像附近找不到{0}……

original_en: Ow, I really want to go to {0}, but I'm short of cash now...
context: 啊，好想去{0}，可是身上的钱好像不太够啊……

original_en: I'm interested in {0}, but I don't have that much money to spare. Sigh.
context: 想去{0}体验一下，可没那么多闲钱呀，有点为难。

original_en: I heard {0} is real good, but I'm on a tight budget.
context: 听说{0}很不错，就是手头有点紧，有点不舍得。

original_en: I really want to go to {0}, but I'm short on cash.
context: 好想去{0}，可惜囊中羞涩啊。

original_en: I wonder if anyone would be kind enough to take me to {0}...
context: 有没有好心人带去{0}啊...

original_en: Scat! You're not allowed to enter! ! !
context: 滚，我不允许你进入！！！

original_en: Come in! What do you need?
context: 进来吧！有什么事？

original_en: It's late. I'm going to bed!
context: 晚上了，我要睡觉了！

original_en: Looks like [#1you] are occupied. I'll drop by later.
context: 看来[#1你]现在很忙，我过会儿再来找你。

original_en: I can only drop you here.
context: 我只能把你放在这了。

original_en: Bastard! Gotta stay alive! Run for it! !
context: 可恶的家伙！保命要紧！！逃！！

original_en: I don't wanna go. So be it! ! !
context: 我不想去了，就这样吧！！！

original_en: Chatter! Chatter chatter! ! ! (Monkey sounds)
context: 叽叽！！叽叽叽！！！（猴叫）。

original_en: (There's no one in the room...)
context: （房间内似乎没有人……）

original_en: Take Head! !
context: 拿取首级！！

original_en: What's this filthy mutt doing here, messing up my place?
context: 哪来的野狗，脏了老子的地方！

original_en: Who do you think you are, dragging your ass around here?
context: 撒泡尿照照自己，什么身份，来这晃悠！

original_en: You got the guts to think it's a place for you!
context: 不看看这是什么地方，也是你能来的?

original_en: Thank you for participating in the Kungfu Contest,my friends! In this world,we worship the power of martial arts. Only the invincible one can be the revered Champion.
context: 感谢各位江湖朋友参与本届武林大会，共襄盛举！！我们大荒以武论英雄，只有武力卓绝力压众人，才能成为人人敬仰的武林盟主。

original_en: When will it begin?
context: 什么时候开始啊

original_en: Agree!
Let’s get started. I can’t wait any more!
context: 快开始吧，我已经等不及了。

original_en: I’m gonna be the one and only Champion!!
context: 我要做武林盟主！！！！！！！！！

original_en: Together,we dominate the martial arts world!
context: 千秋霸业一统江湖

original_en: Duel!!
Nice punch!
context: 打得好

original_en: Impressive!
context: 真是精彩

original_en: Niiiccce!
There’s nothing special with their kungfu.
context: 我看他们的武功都稀松平常

original_en: That move is so quick!
context: 好快的招!

original_en: When will next fight begin? Hurry up!
context: 赶紧下一场

original_en: Who's the next! ! ! !
context: 还有谁？！！！

original_en: I shouldn’t underrate you!
context: 我真是小看了你!

original_en: I’m no match for you. You’ve earned my respect.
context: 佩服~佩服，我不是你的对手。

original_en: Dirty tricks! I’ll let you pay! !
context: 你好卑鄙，我一定会加倍奉还！！

original_en: Your kungfu is truly remarkable. I lost.
context: 阁下武功高绝，在下输了

original_en: Pleased to meet you!
context: 请！

original_en: Pleased to meet you,too!
context: 幸会！

original_en: Give up before it’s not too late!
context: 你认输吧!免得失手伤了你

original_en: You’re no match for me!
context: 你不是我的对手!

original_en: I’ll show no mercy!
context: 我不会手下留情！

original_en: The matchup for this round is {0} vs. {1}.
context: 本轮的对阵双方是 {0} 对 {1}

original_en: It’s my turn.
context: 轮到我了

original_en: The Champion of this Kungfu Contest is:
context: 本届武林盟主是:

original_en: Congrats!
context: 恭贺盟主！

original_en: With your invincible martial arts,you’ve earned our respect! !
context: 盟主武功绝世，我等心悦诚服！！

original_en: Long live the Champion!!
context: 盟主万岁万岁!!

original_en: The one above all!!
context: 盟主天下第一!!!

original_en: <GuideRed>{0}</> days till the Kungfu Contest.
context: 距离武林大会开启还需要<GuideRed>{0}</>天！

original_en: [Thinking of the relations between you two...]

context: 「正在考虑对你的态度……」

original_en: {0}, unable to learn 「{1}」
Since everyone is here,let’s hold a meeting.
context: “大家都到了啊，现在开会议会。”

original_en: Good day,master!
context: 参见掌门！

original_en: Greetings master!
context: 掌门万安！

original_en: Good! No one broke the rules!
context: 很好，没有违规弟子！

original_en: I’m glad to see you behave well!
context: 你们都很自守，我很欣慰！

original_en: Thank you for your teachings,Master!
context: 全赖掌门英明领导!

original_en: We obey whatever you ask,Master!
context: 我等谨遵掌门法旨！

original_en: Let them be punished according to the rules!
context: 这些人依法惩处！

original_en: You disappointed me! All shall be punished harshly!
context: 太让我失望了！全部严惩！

original_en: Time to get your salary!
context: 接下来发放月例！

original_en: {0} made the most contribution this month. Keep going,everyone!
context: 本月{0}贡献最高，其他人继续加油啊！

original_en: Thank you for your instruction,Master! I’m flattered!
context: 拜谢掌门提携！在下惶恐！

original_en: Thank you,Master!
context: 多谢掌门！

original_en: *Sigh*... Thank you... Master...
context: 哎...谢掌门。

original_en: It would be a tough month...
context: 这个月日子不好过了...

original_en: Hope everyone can work harder to bring greatness to our sect!
context: 希望大家继续努力，将门派发扬光大！

original_en: Yes,Master! We will!
context: 是！谨遵法旨！

original_en: We obey whatever you ask,Master!
context: 我等谨遵掌门法旨！

original_en: [Unable to challenge. Higher level required]:You’re not qualified to challenge me
context: 「无法越级挑战」：你还不够向我发起挑战

original_en: I’m no match for you,I admit!
context: 在下甘拜下风！

original_en: Is that all you can do?
context: 就这？

original_en: That's more than what I have in mind. I'll quit.
context: 已经超出我的预期了，我放弃。

original_en: Tough luck! Didn't bring enough cash! !
context: 真是倒霉！没带够银两！！

original_en: I'm bidding {0}. I've got to have this! !
context: 我出 {0} ，此物我势在必得！！

original_en: I'll up the ante. I'm bidding {0}.
context: 我再加一些，出价 {0}。

original_en: I'm not interested.
context: 我对此物不感兴趣

original_en: Since [#1you] want it that bad, I'll have to part with it.
context: 既然[#1你]这么喜欢，我只好忍痛割爱了。

original_en: I'm sorry. It's too dear to me.
context: 实在是抱歉，此物对我太过重要。

original_en: I'm afraid I can't honor your request! !
context: 在下恕难从命！！

original_en: I'd give up
context: 我觉得放弃此物

original_en: Who do you think you are, throwing threats at me? !
context: 你有几斤几两，竞敢威胁我！！
